# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is Jack Frank's homebrew version of the Basic Fantasy Role Playing Game, tailored for his Wistful World of OnceWas campaign. For the original game by Chris Gonnerman, please refer to the [Basic Fantasy Role-Playing Game](https://www.basicfantasy.org) website.
